Lebowski.Net.Local.LocalConnection

Lebowski.Net.Local.LocalConnection Class Reference

Provides functionality to allow local connecctions (i.e. within the application), mainly for testing scenarios. More...

override void Close ()
 <inheritdoc>
void DispatchAll ()
 Makes sure that all packets currently enqueued are dispatched, before the method returns. This is handy for writing tests, as we have to wait until the packets have actually been dispatched before we look at the context states.
void PauseSending ()
 Pauses the sending of messages.
void ResumeSending ()

LocalConnection Endpoint [get, set]

Detailed Description

Provides functionality to allow local connecctions (i.e. within the application), mainly for testing scenarios.

Member Function Documentation

void Lebowski.Net.Local.LocalConnection.DispatchAll (  ) 

Makes sure that all packets currently enqueued are dispatched, before the method returns. This is handy for writing tests, as we have to wait until the packets have actually been dispatched before we look at the context states.

Pauses the sending of messages.
